title: Blizzard Buys Spellbreak Studio for WoW - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.29.22
description:
Blessing and Stella Chung from IGN talk about Blizzard buying Spellbreak's studio, Sony making PC accesories, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:30 - Housekeeping

A new Kinda Funny Gamescast is up and it’s me, Greg, and Andy in maybe one of the most chaotic Gamescast’s of all time since Kevin, Barrett, and Tim were all out yesterday so we had to stitch it together with ducktape. We talk about whether or not we’re still in love with our Switches. That’s on youtube.com/KindaFUnnyGames and podcast services around the globe.

We’re also recording our Ms Marvel episode 4 review pretty much as I speak. That’ll be up on Youtube.com/KindaFunny and on the Screencast podcast feed.

The Roper Report  -

00:09:13 - Blizzard acquires Spellbreak studio Proletariat
00:21:00 - Sony’s starting a new gaming brand for PC
00:30:36 - Sonic Frontiers' Cyber Space Dimension Features Traditional Platforming Stages
00:37:30 - Ad
00:38:38 - DNF Duel & MH Rise Review round Ups
00:49:07 - Skull & Bones Appears to Be Arriving in November
00:54:55 - Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope gets some new details
01:00:37 - We got more casting updates for the Fallout Amazon series!
01:04:49 - Out today
01:06:57 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Greg & Mike Bithell
